description: This file contains CSS styles for theme management and general app layout, including responsive design for a two-player tic-tac-toe game frontend.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Root class for the application layout.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Class for the application logo with specific height and no pointer events.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Class for the header section of the app with styling for layout and color.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Class for styling links within the app.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Class for the theme toggle button with various styling effects.
